resources.string: Date of Birth can not be empty
Practice ID can not be empty
Error generating FCM ID. Please check your internet connection and try again
Please check your information and try again.
Please enter a valid Practice ID

If you press CONTINUE you are consenting to share your information in accordance with the Consult Pal Terms and Conditions (comprising of End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy). If you do not wish to consent please press EXIT.\n\n Do not use this app in case of emergency or as a substitute for immediate medical assistance.
Please use the boxes below to tell us how you are feeling and what you would like to discuss. We are interested in your physical and mental wellbeing.
Hi, I’m %1$s. Please use the boxes below to tell me how you are feeling and what you would like to discuss. I am interested in your physical and mental wellbeing.
1) How long have you had this issue:
2) Does it affect your daily activities?

I don\'t know what to write?

Please begin with your main health concern. If you have other problems that you would like to discuss, just enter them in the other boxes.

I put the wrong problem in the wrong box.

That\’s OK. Just drag the boxes into the order you would like.

Why are the boxes different colours?

The box colour denotes the urgency of your health concern. The top box is red, which should indicate your main trouble.

I don\'t think the doctor has time to address my concerns.

That may be the case today but it is important your doctor understands you better by becoming aware of these concerns. You may not think they are important but your doctor may be able to advise you on them, refer you to another professional, or ask you to return on another date to discuss them further.

I don\’t have time today to think about my problems and write them here.

That\’s OK. We understand your health can be very complicated and may take more time to think about. If you want to, you can use this app at another location, in your own time, to enter your problems. You could even ask someone to help you.

If I share my problems here, will my Doctor be able to see them, and what will they do with them?

Yes, your Doctor can view these problems any time, because they are stored on a safe and secure database. Your Doctor can copy these problems to your Electronic Patient Record, so they will be accessible in future to be able to offer you the best treatments based on this history.
Thank you. I will see you shortly.
